channel.title: Mail.app <-> Airmail
channel.description:
I use MailMate on Mac and Airmail on iOS, and often copy links to emails. I made this action to quickly convert links back and forth so I can easily open messages from any platform. This action works on the selected text and replaces it with the alternate link; it should be safe to use on random text since it will not change it.
